com.stormpath.sdk.provider

Interface CreateProviderRequestBuilder<T extends CreateProviderRequestBuilder>

  • All Known Subinterfaces:
    FacebookCreateProviderRequestBuilder, GenericOAuth2CreateProviderRequestBuilder, GithubCreateProviderRequestBuilder, GoogleCreateProviderRequestBuilder, LinkedInCreateProviderRequestBuilder, TwitterCreateProviderRequestBuilder

    public interface CreateProviderRequestBuilder<T extends CreateProviderRequestBuilder>
    A Builder to construct CreateProviderRequests.
    Since:
    1.0.beta
    See Also:
    ProviderRequestFactory.builder(), Providers.FACEBOOK, Providers.GOOGLE

    • Method Detail

      • setClientId

        T setClientId(String clientId)
        Setter for the the App ID of your Provider application (e.g. for "google" it looks similar to "143482128708.apps.googleusercontent.com").
        Parameters:
        clientId - the App ID for your Provider application.
        Returns:
        the builder instance for method chaining.

      • setClientSecret

        T setClientSecret(String clientSecret)
        Setter for the the App Secret of your Provider application (e.g. for "google" it looks similar to "U-IdloztzwLn2_2M4QjpulPq").
        Parameters:
        clientSecret - the App Secret for your Provider application.
        Returns:
        the current builder instance for method chaining.

      • setUserInfoMappingRules

        T setUserInfoMappingRules(UserInfoMappingRules userInfoMappingRules)
        set rules for mapping fields from userInfo provided by the social provider to Stormpath Account attributes for Accounts created in the associated Stormpath Directory.
        Parameters:
        userInfoMappingRules - rules for mapping fields from userInfo provided by the social provider to Stormpath Account attributes.
        Returns:
        the current builder instance for method chaining.
        Since:
        1.3.0

      • build

        CreateProviderRequest build()
        Creates a new CreateProviderRequest instance based on the current builder state.
        Returns:
        a new CreateProviderRequest instance based on the current builder state.
